scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm run build
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:unit:frontend && npm run test:unit:backend
scripts.test:integration: npm run test:integration:frontend && npm run test:integration:backend
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:all:full: npm run typecheck && npm run test:all
scripts.test:all:pipeline: npm run typecheck && npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e:guarded
scripts.test:all:pipeline:soft: (npm run typecheck || true) && (npm run test:unit || true) && (npm run test:integration || true) && (npm run test:e2e:guarded || true)
scripts.test:all:ci: CI=1 npm --prefix frontend run test:ci && CI=1 npm --prefix backend run test:unit:ci && CI=1 npm --prefix backend run test:integration:ci && CI=1 npm run test:e2e:guarded
scripts.test:watch:unit: concurrently -k -s first -n front,back -c green,blue "npm --prefix frontend run test:watch" "npm --prefix backend run test:watch"
scripts.test:watch:integration: concurrently -k -s first -n front,back -c green,blue "npm --prefix frontend run test:integration -- --watch" "npm --prefix backend run test:integration -- --watch"
scripts.typecheck:strict: npm --prefix frontend run typecheck:strict && npm --prefix backend run typecheck:strict
scripts.test:e2e:guarded: node scripts/check-e2e-env.js && npm run test:e2e || (echo 'Skipping E2E: environment not ready.' && exit 0)
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:frontend && npm run test:coverage:backend && npm run coverage:report
scripts.typecheck: npm --prefix frontend run typecheck && npm --prefix backend run typecheck
scripts.test:validate: echo 'Test validation moved to individual directories'
scripts.test:fix: echo 'Test fixes moved to individual directories'
scripts.start:test-env: concurrently -k -s first -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm --prefix backend run dev" "npm --prefix frontend run start:test-env"
scripts.coverage:all: (npm run test:coverage:frontend || true) && (npm run test:coverage:backend || true) && npm run coverage:collect
scripts.backup: docker-compose --profile production exec postgres pg_dump -U l2p_user learn2play > backup_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).sql
scripts.test:browsers:install:all: cd frontend && npx --yes playwright install --with-deps && cd e2e && npx --yes playwright install --with-deps
scripts.pipeline:complete: npm run test:config:init && npm run test:config:validate && (npm run test:env:validate || true) && (npm run test:browsers:install:all || true) && npm run test:all:pipeline && npm run coverage:all
